author: Utku Tevkir
text:
Tried 1 week already emailing. Dont get any response...

I ordered shoes. The payment was taken but after it send me back to stockx.com it showed something went wrong on the screen. The money was still taken and i didnt get any order confirmation or anything. The order was canceled but the money they take.. and now im already 1 week trying to get an answer from them...
title: payment taken, order didnt work..

author: Sally
text:
I have been trying to contact you with no results.  I ordered one pair of shoes for my grandson and received two packages separate.  I only ordered one pair and need tonreturn the unopened package.  I have refuted one of the charges on my credit card as I only placed one order.  Please advise how send unopened package back!!
Sally Burgoyne

author: Roland
text: I made my first order with Stockx. It took almost 2 weeks to get an email that my item shipped to Stockx for authentication. Then a week later I received another emailed stating my order is delayed. I still have not received my order. Stockx charges more for shipping and their fee is higher than others, therefore I didn't expect these issues.
title: I made my first order with Stockx

title: STOCKX IS SO TRASH & GARBAGE !!

author: Gaveitashot
text:
Great platform, very smooth and easy experience. Great selection, wide range and well categorized. Absolute horrid operations. Really bad quality control and very inconsistent on what gets to the buyer. Gave it two tries, damaged order first time, defective order second time. Useless customer service. First order: told to just pay them more money to use the platform to dump the damaged item on some other poor unexpecting soul. Second order: Didn't bother responding to my ticket.

From buyer's perspective: Overall, StockX runs a terrible operation, doesn't seem to care about it's customers and lacks accountability and transparency. Fortunately, those can all be fixed, but it's too late for me. Right now, you're just paying them a fee to put a sticker or tag on the item and wait extra days.
title: Great platform, but... DO NOT RECOMMEND

author: Esthelle
text: The delivery is taking too long, I ordered the 5th April and I still haven’t received my package. But otherwise I don’t have any other complaints
title: The delivery is taking too long
